org.apache.solr.analytics.accumulator

Class FacetingAccumulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.lucene.search.SimpleCollector
      • org.apache.solr.analytics.accumulator.ValueAccumulator
        • org.apache.solr.analytics.accumulator.BasicAccumulator
          • org.apache.solr.analytics.accumulator.FacetingAccumulator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Collector, LeafCollector, FacetValueAccumulator

    public class FacetingAccumulator
extends BasicAccumulator
implements FacetValueAccumulator
    A FacetingAccumulator manages the StatsCollectors and Expressions for facets.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  FacetingAccumulator.EntryComparator
      A comparator to compare expression values for field facet sorting.
